title.en: Spanish for Pre-Intermediate Learners II, Level A2.2 > B1.1
title.et: Hispaania keel eelkesktasemele II, tase A2.2 > B1.1

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

description.en: Special emphasis of this semester is set to understand the wide Spanish verbal system. Students will be able to talk about their future and their past, to tell experiences and to describe situations happened in the past. The difference between preterito perfecto, indefinido and imperfecto and some ways to increase vocabulary (derivación léxica) will be the main aims of this semester. In the next semester we continue with the hopes and ambitions.
description.et:
Teemad: tervitamine; enese ja teiste tutvustamine; maad; rahvad; keeled; arvud; järgarvud; telefoninumbrite küsimine ja ütlemine; ametid; perekond; kellaaeg; igapäevategevustest rääkimine; huvidest rääkimine; kohvikus/restoranis käimine;  kodu kirjeldamine; teenete palumine; linna kirjeldamine.
Grammatika: reeglipäraste ja ebareeglipäraste verbide pööramine olevikus; refleksiivsete verbide pööramine; omastav asesõna; verb gustar, eessõnad, käskiv kõneviis; tegusõnade hay ja está kasutamine; tegusõnade ser ja estar kasutamine.

objectives.en: The course aims at systematic development of all four language skills (reading, writing, listening, speaking) through a wide variety of tasks. Method used in class is communicative. Examinations include following skills: reading comprehension, listening, grammar and vocabulary exercises, writing and speaking. Active participation in class activities is taken into consideration.

learning_outcomes.en: Can understand the main points of clear standard input on familiar matters regularly encountered in work, school, leisure, etc. Can deal with most situations likely to arise whilst travelling in an area where the language is spoken. Can produce simple connected text on topics which are familiar or of personal interest. Can describe experiences and events, dreams, hopes & ambitions and briefly give reasons and explanations for opinions and plans.

grade_preconditions.et:
a) Asistencia al 80% de las clases
b) Aprobar los controles de la evaluación continua
c) Participación activa en clase y realización de la tarea

grade_evaluation.et:
La calificación de este curso es APTO/NO APTO
Para poder recibir una calificación de APTO es necesario asistir al 80% de las clases, aprobar los controles, participar activamente en clase y entregar la tarea.
